text: Andrew Lumsden may refer to: * Andrew Lumsden (bishop), Bishop of Edinburgh 1727-1733 * Andrew Lumsden (choral director) (born 1962), organist and choral director * Andrew Lumsden (scientist), English neurobiologist * Andrew Lumisden or Lumsden (1720-1801) private secretary to Prince Charles Edward Stuart, joint founder of the Royal Society of Edinburgh
title: Andrew Lumsden
